quest.name: In Darkness the Magatama Dreams
journal: Alisaie's sigh tells you all you need to know about her state of mind.
objectives: Use the enchanted lamp to find a shimmering object.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Everywhere we go it's the same. “Go away, we don't want any.” You'd think I'd be used to it by now, but some stupid part of me just can't help hoping for the best.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We seem to have reached an impasse. And to make matters worse, every solution I can think of will only take more time...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I don't suppose you have any ideas, do you, Forename?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: We could try...talking Shiosai round?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: We could ask the villagers if they know anything.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Soroban sent us here. Mayhap we should ask him.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: We find some Red Kojin, and encourage them to talk.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Right...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Heh! The thought of administering a little encouragement does have its appeal...but I would need to be convinced that the Red Kojin knew anything before resorting to violence.

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: (-???-)You are the ones who came from above, yes? If we could have a moment of your time?

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: Mine apologies. I did not mean to startle you. My name is Ihanami, and this is my wife Yunagi.

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: We were wondering... Have you any news from Doma? If so, we should like very much to hear it.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: May I ask why?

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: ...If you must. Our daughter fought in the rebellion. We have heard naught from her since.

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: 'Twould be too much to hope that you know of her, but...her name is Yugiri.

dialogue.name: YUNAGI
dialogue.text: Kami be praised! She lives! She lives...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We're looking for her too, actually, but I'm sure she's all right.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We had no idea she hailed from Sui–no–Sato. How did she come to serve Doma as a shinobi?

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: It all began when she was a little girl. She and another child crept out of the village, having grown curious about the outside world. To Doma they went, where they met a young boy─a proud son of Yanxia.

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: His tales of imperial oppression left a lasting impression on her. When she returned, she spoke passionately of the Domans' plight and urged us to take the boy in. But my wife and I would not hear of it.

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: We thought the matter closed, but she never forgot his words. She became convinced that the Garleans would one day come for us. And it was in search of the strength to defend us that she left, years later, to learn the ways of the shinobi...

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: When the then Ruby Princess learned of this, she forbade Yugiri's return, lest she bring misfortune to us all.

dialogue.name: YUNAGI
dialogue.text: We protested the judgment, but there was naught we could do. And so our daughter, who wanted only to keep her people safe...

dialogue.name: YUNAGI
dialogue.text: Surely there is something we can do for these people? They who gave her aid and succor when no other would?

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: ...I am but a humble stonemason. But if it is the Yasakani–no–Magatama you seek, I may yet be of some assistance to you.

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: The jewel is known to possess an unusual property. To the naked eye it is as jade, but when bathed in a particular light, it shimmers with a divine resplendence.

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: I have mined similar materials before. To find them, one must use these lamps.

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: They cast an invisible light, under which the stones sparkle. In the deepest depths, they are invaluable.

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: There is a sunken ship to the east. Though the currents may have spirited away her cargo, you should begin your search there.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Thank you so much. We will do just that!

dialogue.name: YUNAGI
dialogue.text: I hope you find that which you seek. I only wish there were something more we could do to assist you... Know that you will be in my prayers.

dialogue.name: YUNAGI
dialogue.text: And...when next you see our daughter, pray tell her not a day goes by that her parents and her brothers do not think of her.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We will. I promise!

dialogue.name: IHANAMI
dialogue.text: I would so dearly like to hear more of your adventures with my daughter─but I understand time is of the essence. Go now, and use the lamps as I told you. ...Ah! But be aware that their light only shines for short periods.

dialogue.name: YUNAGI
dialogue.text: May the kami speed you on your journey!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Leave this area to me!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: If this wreck is the selfsame vessel of which Soroban spoke, then if the gods are good, the Magatama is nearby...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ready your lamp and keep your eyes open, Forename. We're going to need to take this slowly. Move too fast and we risk overlooking something.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To find the Yasakani–no–Magatama, you will need to search the area marked on your map.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Use your lamp to pinpoint the precise location of the treasure and claim it!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I wish I knew how far the light from these lamps travels...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You raise your lamp high, but notice naught out of the ordinary...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Though you cannot say for certain, you think you glimpse a flickering light in the distance...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: For an instant, you spy a flash of light. You are getting closer...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The flash is unmistakable in the dark, but you are still unable to pinpoint its exact location. Just a little closer...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: There! Peeping out from beneath a fine layer of sand, you spy something shimmering!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I swear, looking for a needle in a haystack would be quicker. Gosetsu will have died of old age by the time we finish. You haven't found anything, have you, Forename?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: This...this is it! The Yasakani–no–Magatama, exactly as Soroban described!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Heh, it would seem that our fortunes have finally changed for the better!
